vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Ezr.2.44; also called Sia at Neh.7.47;
§ Sia or Siaha = "departing"
ancestor of a family of temple slaves who returned from exile with Zerubbabel
vocabInfos._es_Definition: jefe de familia; sirvientes del templo; post exílico \jefe de familia; sirvientes del templo; post exílico
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
西亞 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "離開"
跟隨所羅巴伯被擄歸回的聖殿殿役的一個家族祖先
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
西亚 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "离开"
跟随所罗巴伯被掳归回的圣殿殿役的一个家族祖先
